modName: Blacksmiths Guild - Weapons of the Third Era
summary: Adds crafting of Master of Shadows Weapons of the Third Era at its own custom forge in the Blacksmiths\' Guild Cavern - no more crafting menu clutter!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow][size=+2] Weapons of the Third Era at The Blacksmith\'s Guild[/color][/size]


[color=orange][size=+1]*****Eliminates crafting menu clutter by placing items into their own exclusive forge*****[/color][/size]


[color=red][size=+1]*****This mod is a crafting .esp only and contains no weapons meshes/textures!!!!***** [/color][/center][/size]

[size=+1]How does it work?[/size]

[color=orange][size=+1]1)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Blacksmiths\' Guild core mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524[/url]

[color=orange][size=+1]2)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Weapons of the Third Era
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12892] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12892[/url]

[color=orange][size=+1]3)[/color][/size] DELETE 3rdEraWeaponsMoS.esm from Skyrim/Data folder
[color=red](Do this before downloading my 3rdEraWeapons.esm to avoid a \'clash\'  .esm files!!!!)[/color]
(NOTE: The original 3rdEraWeapons.esm can be moved to desktop for later restoration if desired, rather than deleted at Step 3.)
this step will:
-	eliminate 3rdEra\'s weapons from all vanilla forges
-	keep 3rdEra\'s meshes/textures \'in the background\'

[color=orange][size=+1]4)[/color][/size] De-activate/Uncheck 3rdEraWeaponsMoS.esp
this step will:
-	reduce the frequency of items spawning on levelled lists to balance better with vanilla and other mods

[color=orange][size=+1]5)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM the SG_3rdEraWeapons files from this page here . . . the one you\'re on now . . . 

[color=orange][size=+1]6)[/color][/size] Confirm my 3rdEraWeapons.esm is Activated/Checked
this step will:
-	allow my .esp to access 3rdEra\'s meshes/textures

[color=orange][size=+1]7)[/color][/size] Confirm my SG_3rdEraWeapons.esp is Activated/Checked
this step will:
-	add 3rdEra\'s Weapon\'s to Master of Shadow\'s Forge at the Blacksmiths\' Guild 
-	maintain 3rdEra\'s Weapons on 3rdEra\'s \'reduced but balanced\' levelled lists
-	maintain 3rdEra\'s Weapons across their original crafting categories (mostly!)
---	Wood x 2/Iron x 9/Steel x 31/Orcish x 2/Dwarven x 3/Elven x 2/Glass x 20/Ebony x 8/Daedric x 9 
-	maintain 3rdEra\'s glass armour pieces in their original crafting category

----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=red]CHANGE LOG:[/size][/color]
V.1.02 - separated esm and esp files; tweaked levelled list distributions (June 06, 2012)
V.1.01 - Corrected esm/esp file mismatch error (May 29, 2012) 
V.1.00 - Original Upload

-----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color]

Master of Shadows is the owner of the intellectual property/assets presented here - I only added the \'craftability.\' Feel free to open up my .esp and play with it; but, give me some credit if you then re-upload anything.

Check with Master of Shadows about the meshes/textures.

-------------------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]CREDITS[/size][/color]

Master of Shadows - it really is the Master\'s stuff!!!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12892]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12892[/url]

Master of Shadows - thanks for the \'okay\' to mess with your stuff . . .
